SEARCH
Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device

Class DeviceFilesCreator

java.lang.Object
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.device.DeviceFilesCreator
public class DeviceFilesCreator extends Object
This class has a number of static methods to create Device and WireEnumerator objects from XDLRC files. It also makes sure not to recreate XDLRC files if they already exist.
Author:
Chris Lavin Created on: May 20, 2010

  • Method Details

    • createXDLRC

      public static String createXDLRC(String partName)
      Makes sure an XDLRC file exists, will create if necessary.
      Parameters:
      partName - Name of the part to create the XDLRC file for.
      Returns:
      Name of the existing or newly created XDLRC file.

    • createWireEnumerator

      public static WireEnumerator createWireEnumerator(String partName)
      Either loads or creates the WireEnumerator for the family of partName.
      Parameters:
      partName - Name of the part to create WireEnumerator for.
      Returns:
      The loaded or newly created WireEnumerator

    • createDeviceTileMap

      public static HashMap<String,Integer> createDeviceTileMap(String partName)
      Creates a tileMap for XDLRC parsing and creating device. This creates a brief version of the XDLRC to get tile names with coordinates.
      Parameters:
      partName - The name of the part to create the tileMap for.
      Returns:
      The created tile map

    • createDevice

      public static void createDevice(String partName, WireEnumerator we)
      Creates the device and primitive defs specified by partName.
      Parameters:
      partName - Name of the part to create
      we - Wire Enumerator corresponding to partName's family.

    • removeBackwardsEdgesFromDevice

      public static void removeBackwardsEdgesFromDevice(Device dev, WireEnumerator we)
      This method will read in a device files and remove backward edges from the wire connections in each tile. This makes routing easier as it removes edges that don't exist in the FPGA.

    • createPartFiles

      public static void createPartFiles(String partName)
      Main method for this class that ensures all part files are created for the partName given.
      Parameters:
      partName - The name of the device to generate Device, PrimitiveDefs and Wire Enumerator files for.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Creates the appropriate primitive defs
      Parameters:
      args - The first argument should be the Xilinx part name with package and speed grade
